content: this listing is for a very easy to crochet hexagon cardigan pattern it is very easy to follow pattern with plenty of photos this pattern is 13 pages long and features in depth explanations lots of photos and a link to the full length video tutorial it is written in us terms with british terms in brackets this crochet cardigan is slightly oversized this is a very inclusive pattern with sizes ranging from s to xxxxxl for this project you will need 4 skeins sizes xs/s/m 5 skeins sizes l/xl 6 skeins sizes xxl/xxxl of caron simply soft yarn in shade orchid a 5 and 4 5 mm crochet hook a tapestry needle a pair of scissors this pattern is very beginner friendly pattern will be available for instant download upon purchase this pattern is written in us terms british terms in brackets for extra help you can contact me by message happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
